definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to calling; used in calling or vocation .
Used in address; appellative ; said of the case or form of the noun, pronoun, or adjective by which a person or thing is addressed.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to calling; used in calling or vocation .
secondary_definitions: ( grammar ) Used in address; appellative ; said of the case or form of the noun, pronoun, or adjective by which a person or thing is addressed.
